# UIView.Invalidations.Tuple

**Structure**

A change that invalidates a combination of factors covered by the other invalidation types.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Tuple<Invalidation1, Invalidation2> where Invalidation1 : UIViewInvalidating, Invalidation2 : UIViewInvalidating
```

## Overview

The system uses this type when a change invalidates multiple aspects of a view. Use a tuple of the static values defined in [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewInvalidating] when more than one invalidation type applies to a change.

## Creating the invalidation structure

- **init(_:_:)**: Creates an invalidation structure with multiple invalidations.

## Invalidation types

- **UIView.Invalidations.Configuration**: A change that invalidates a view’s configuration.
- **UIView.Invalidations.Constraints**: A change that invalidates a view’s constraints.
- **UIView.Invalidations.Display**: A change that requires the system to redraw a view’s content.
- **UIView.Invalidations.IntrinsicContentSize**: A change that invalidates a view’s intrinsic size.
- **UIView.Invalidations.Layout**: A change that invalidates the layout of the containing view’s subviews.

## Conforms To

- UIViewInvalidating
